The house is surrounded by a wooden fence, which adds to its rustic charm.  In the foreground, there is a small boat resting on the water. The boat is simple in design, with a few wooden planks forming its hull. The water is calm, reflecting the sky and the surrounding landscape.  To the left of the house, there are several trees. The trees are bare, suggesting that it might be late autumn or early winter. Their branches are twisted and gnarled, indicating they have been exposed to harsh weather conditions.  In the background, there is a distant horizon line, indicating a flat plain or a flat body of water.
